metadata.title: CVE-2017-9438 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: libyara/re.c in the regexp module in YARA 3.5.0 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (stack consumption) via a crafted rule (involvinghex strings) that is mishandled in the _yr_re_emit function, a differentvulnerability than CVE-2017-9304.

criterions.comment: yara package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
